title: 踊

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack someone at night.
- During the day, choose someone to fight. At the beginning of the next night, each of you may choose a night ability to use. At the end of that night, you will each use the chosen ability on the other, and the feedback each of your receive for those abilities will be publicly announced.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may not use your first ability outside of fights.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill at least two people, attack but fail to kill at least one person, and have at least one person attack but fail to kill you.

desc:
Post 2260
*Fall to tears or laugh and jeer, just never let me go!*
